Package org.restlet.ext.raml

Integration with Mulesoft Raml @minor-version@.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RamlApplication
    RAML enabled application.
    RamlSpecificationRestlet
    Restlet that generates RAML documentation in the format defined by the RAML specifications.
    It helps to generate the documentation for the whole API (set by calling RamlSpecificationRestlet.setApiInboundRoot(Application) or RamlSpecificationRestlet.setApiInboundRoot(Restlet) methods.
    By default it instrospects the chain of Application's routers, filters, restlets.

Package org.restlet.ext.raml Description

Integration with Mulesoft Raml @minor-version@. Raml is a description framework that lets you document your web API. This extension can generate the Yaml description document following the Raml format.
Since:
Restlet 2.3
See Also:
Raml framework, User Guide - Raml extension
